diff_hunk:
@@ -761,6 +761,12 @@ PyObject * THPTensor_(stride)(PyObject *self, PyObject *args, PyObject *kwargs)
         - accreal start
         - accreal end
         - CONSTANT 1
+      - arguments:
body:
I missed that change. The contbuild is failing because of a syntax error in that file. You'll  also probably have to make the same change as you did in `generic/methods/Tensor.cwrap` because C++ doesn't support optional arguments before non-optional ones. (Instead it has to be listed as two functions as you do here.)

To test it locally, you can run `python setup.py build develop`

body_text:
I missed that change. The contbuild is failing because of a syntax error in that file. You'll  also probably have to make the same change as you did in generic/methods/Tensor.cwrap because C++ doesn't support optional arguments before non-optional ones. (Instead it has to be listed as two functions as you do here.)
To test it locally, you can run python setup.py build develop
